Projects

Cloud Resume Challenge

· Created a website to show my personal resume and display the number of times the site has been visited.
· Used HTML/CSS resume template for the page content and added a JavaScript function to make an API call.
· Leveraged AWS serverless architecture to host the website and handle the backend operations including S3, Route53, CloudFront, API Gateway, Lambda, and DynamoDB.
· Provisioned the backend through IaC using Terraform and implemented a CI/CD pipeline using GigHub Actions.


AWS Game Day Challenge 2022

· Deployed, maintained and optimized microservices for other teams to use.
· Published microservice on the "Services Marketplace" and placed them in a Dynamo Table.
· Made frontend API (called the "Service Router") highly available by configuring Application Load Balancer and Autoscaling Groups.
· Monitored and troubleshooted microservices using X-Ray, Cloud Watch Metrics and Cloud Watch Logs.
